about_the_game:
Welcome back to the world of A Building Full of Cats!
In this sequel, not only will you be petting all the cats in the building, but you'll also be assisting its residents with various tasks.
Can you pet all the cats and make a difference in the lives of the building's residents?

  • More Than 1300 Cats!
  • Help the Residents!
  • Discover hidden rooms, uncover secrets, and find special items.
detailed_description:
Welcome back to the world of A Building Full of Cats!
In this sequel, not only will you be petting all the cats in the building, but you'll also be assisting its residents with various tasks.
Can you pet all the cats and make a difference in the lives of the building's residents?

  • More Than 1300 Cats!
  • Help the Residents!
  • Discover hidden rooms, uncover secrets, and find special items.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any OS with x11 support
  • Processor: 1.3GHz or more, 64-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

name: A Building Full of Cats 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or superior
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

short_description: Welcome back to the world of A Building Full of Cats! In this sequel, not only will you be petting all the cats in the building, but you'll also be assisting its residents with various tasks. Can you pet all the cats and make a difference in the lives of the building's residents?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
